posts.message:
Rust has had and continues to have a rough climb uphill to their 1.0 release compared to Go. In particular the rapid changes in the language usually ends up breaking BC and as such breaking community libraries. This call for contributions showed up on their mailing list. 

For anyone who's been meaning to hack on rust but not sure what to do or anyone already hacking on it but looking to make an impact.
Happy coding

https://mail.mozilla.org/pipermail/rust-dev/2014-June/010139.html

posts.caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

الى موجود معايا فى الصورة ده اسمه Mick Ebeling ده مؤسس مشروع eye writer او eye can الى هوا الاسم الحالى .
انا ومايك متفقين فى نفس المشكلة ونفس الفكرة ونفس تصميم النضارة بس الفرق ان انا خدت اتجاه وهوا اتجاه هوا بدأ قبلى بفترة على فكرة بس انا كنت متابع كويس هوا وصل لايه . انا هوا بسنتخدم مكتبات معالجة رسومية مختلفة 
النظام والادوات الى انا كنت بستخدمها 
Windows + OpenCV + EmguCV + Afroge.Net + Pinvoke + VisualStudio by C# 
هوا بقى كان بيشتغل على انظمة ماك بوك وبيتسخدم 
MacOSX + OpenFrameWorks 
احنا الاتنين دلوقت فى نفس المرحلة من التطوير وواقفين فى نقطة معينه تخص نقطة الــ Calibration 
احنا الاتنين اعتمدنا على الابحاث الى اتعملت قبل كده فى الموضوع الخاصة بالاجهزة الغالية فى التكلفة 
الملخص انا كنت بستهدف انظمة ويندوز عشان التكلفة وان اجهزة ماك غير متاحة لاغلب الناس وسعرها غالى جدا اما هوا كان شايف ان اجهزة ماك متاحة فى امريكا بشكل كبير 

ودى الــ Methods الخاصة بالمشروع بتاعى 
1. Input camera 
• AForge.NET framework will be used to access the access USB cameras and send captured video to the system.
2. Image Processing 
• The captured frame (color images ) will be converted to its greyscale equivalent on the fly. 
• The greyscale image shows the effective brightness or luminance of the color image. 
• Red, green and blue values will be multiplied by 0.3, 0.59 and 0.11 respectively. The sum of the product will be calculated to give the single pixel value, which is greyscale.
• Haar-cascades will be used to achieve high detection accuracy.
• Haar-cascades will be used to determine the eye location
• After having the eye location will be set ROI over the pupil 
• The pixels of that image is stored
• use a calibration sequence to map the tracked eye pupil coordinates to certain positions onto a computer screen
• determine which direction the user is looking at

3. Move Pointer 
• SendInput API will be used for synthesizing and sending input leading to mouse motions and clicks.

posts.message:
Awesome lecture about aspect oriented programming to avoid the repetition of the code

http://www.infoq.com/presentations/Advanced-AOP
posts.caption: www.infoq.com
posts.description: Donald Belcham presents how to use AOP to avoid code repetition without following the decorator pattern along with frameworks supporting such aspects.
